page.title: 09ROSELAND GDNS. EST. REDRUTH
page.content: The {ROSELAND GARDENS HOUSING ESTATE} is a modern, private housing estate, situated on the Northern edge of REDRUTH, half a mile from the town centre. Before development the site was farmland. The first houses were completed in 1965. Some building is in progress(1985) and more is planned for the future. We gathered information about Roseland Gardens through a door to door survey. We were able to survey 92 of the 156 homes (59%) on the estate, and our data is drawn from this sample. {HOMES}..50% HOUSES, 50% BUNGALOWS 26% DETACHED,67% SEMIDETACHED 5% TERRACED, 1% END TERRACED {BEDROOMS}..0% I BEDROOM,21% WITH 2 63% 3 BEDROOMS,14% WITH 4 2% HAVE 5 BEDROOMS
